item.title: Basic Linux Skills for Remote Controlling
item.description: Instruction Here we provides some basic instructions for how to access to the remote Linux server. We assume that the reader who learn this instruction could grant such conditions: Use a client device equipped with Windows; Has the full authority on both the client and the server; The client and the server is in the same domain. To perform a test of whether it is ok for network equipments, type this command in Windows CMD:
